article.headline: Epic seeks temporary order to stop Apple from removing Fortnite app
article.body: Epic Games Inc. has asked a federal court in California to block Apple Inc.'s AAPL, +1.74% removal of Fortnite from its app store days after Epic sued Apple and Alphabet Inc.'s GOOGL, +1.82% GOOG, +1.97% Google for what it claims is anti-competitive behavior. Epic also asked the court to stop the iPhone maker from terminating its developer account on Aug. 28 and booting the game maker from iOS and Mac development tools.
